item.title: Awalyache lonche (आवळ्याचे लोणचे)
item.description: English Awalyache lonche Ingredients: Pound kilograms (usually comes in 1-2), 1 tablespoon salt, 1 tsp mustard, 1 tbsp fried fenugreek seeds, 1 tbsp chili, 2 tablespoons oil, to boil 1 tsp hing, 1 tsp turmeric powder.
